data.title: The Family
data.meta_description: I have been married to my "first wife", Judy for 56 years as of September 2, 2023.  We're very proud of our family and I couldn't resist sharing this photo  taken at our youngest son's wedding...
data.text:
I have been married to my "first wife", Judy for 56 years as of September 2, 2023. We're very proud of our family and I couldn't resist sharing this photo taken at our youngest son's wedding November 5, 2016.

From Left to Right: Jay, oldest son, Tavin, #1 grandson, Marisa, Jay's wife, Madison, #1 granddaughter, Kaylyne, Ben's wife, Ben, youngest son, Judy, Larry
